results.name: Denominators of Sum_{k=1..n} 1/k^6 = Zeta(6,n).
comment: For the numerators and comments, see A103345.
mathematica: s=0; lst={}; Do[s+=n^1/n^7; AppendTo[lst,Denominator[s]],{n,3*4!}]; lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 24 2009 *)
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Feb 15 2005
